Gas Mask is an interesting respirator based on the German GM24 series gas mask. It used a tall metal filter canister and a long fabricized breathing hose attached to an angular metal inhale/exhale assembly. The C.M.P. is a very scarce mask today and when found is usually in poor hardened condition.
